document_data.name: Control Temperature, 10' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Control temperature, 10' radius''''' was an [[alteration]] spell that allowed the caster to raise or lower the temperature of the immediate environment around the caster.
document_data.History: It was recorded in ''[[Yornar's Trail Companion]]'', a holy text of the [[church of Mielikki]].<ref>
